Title: Relates to enacting the shelter animal rescue act
Summary: Enacts the shelter animal rescue act, which requires the release of a shelter animal to a rescue group upon request of the rescue group prior to the euthanasia of such animal.
LawCode: Add ยง374-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring the release of a shelter animal to a rescue group upon request of the rescue group prior to the euthanasia of such animal
